company_profile.company_name_placeholder: Enter the official name of the company
company_profile.company_name_character_limit: Character limit, only up to 50 characters allowed.
company_profile.industry_description: Select your company's main area of activity.
company_profile.about_us_placeholder: Ex.: Magneto HR is a next-generation job board powered by AI and Blockchain. Our job board is designed to connect job seekers and employers faster and smarter. Unlike traditional job boards, Magneto HR uses AI-driven matching to ensure relevant, high-quality job matches instead of generic listings.
company_profile.about_us_character_limit: Character limit, only up to 800 characters allowed.
company_profile.headquarters_location_description: Enter the address where your company is located.
company_profile.website_url_placeholder: Enter the company's official website URL
company_profile.upload_formats: JPEG, PNG, SVG, WebP up to 1MB
company_profile.company_culture_tooltip: Company culture refers to the work environment and overall philosophy in that company. Please select up to two cultural attributes that describe your company. This allows us to better connect you with candidates who will thrive in your unique environment, ensuring a stronger team fit and long-term success.
company_profile.errors_modal_title: There are some errors in your form
company_profile.exit_modal_content: Are you sure you want to exit without completing your profile? If you leave now, you won't be able to access all platform features until your company profile is complete

noadmin_page_profile_creation.permanent_address_message: Use a permanent address where you can receive mail.
noadmin_page_profile_creation.error_message_generic: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again later
